results.name: Riordan array (1/(1-2x), x(1-x)/(1-2x)^2).
comment: Row sums are A081567. Diagonal sums are A085810. Product of Pascal triangle A007318 and Morgan-Voyce triangle A085478.
Unsigned version of A123876. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 25 2007
formula: Number triangle T(n,k) = Sum_{j=0..n} C(n, j)*C(j+k, 2k);
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 15 2005
